snippet.title: Over 190 Unique Emerald Locations! - Knuckles' Emerald Hunt Mania - Sonic Mania Mods - SAGE 2020
snippet.description:
In this video i take Knuckles' Emerald Hunt by Bluestreak Mods and Add Randomization and An Emerald radar, as well as other Quality of Life Improvements. 

Please note do to circumstances beyond our control, mods will not work on the Origin release of Sonic Mania. Only the Steam Release is supported. 

Download the mod here: 
https://gamebanana.com/wips/51910

Checkout Bluestreak Mods Here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFqIj5ZfEcqzpNdlhKfJdgA

The Original Knuckles Emerald Hunt by MainMemory http://info.sonicretro.org/Knuckles%27_Emerald_Hunt

Checkout MainMemory_ Here:
https://www.youtube.com/user/sonicmike2

~~~~~~~~~~~~About My Patreon~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Support This Channel on Patreon and to ensure that even with all of youtube's up and downs that I can keep making videos and serving the Sonic Modding Community. sign up for the Proud Patreon Tier and Get your name on EVERY video.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~My Links ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/CnGMods
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Codenamegamma
Discord Server: http://codenamegamma.com/discord
Instagram: http://instagram.com/codenamegamma
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~All Artwork (Profile Picture, Mascot Avatar, and More) Created by Setenza_Art unless otherwise noted.
Follow Her on Twitter @Setenza_Art *Commissions Available*
https://twitter.com/Setenza_Art

~~"Paper" Naomi Artwork Created by @Clarissa_Arts on Twitter follow her if your interested in getting a commission done.

~~"Thumbnail" Artwork created by @sonisis_  on Twitter follow her if your interested in getting a commission done.
